title: Slow Cooking for Two (2016).epub Gooner
description:
Slow Cooking for Two - The Ultimate Guide to Slow Cooking With 45 Easy to Prepare Recipes for Two (2016).epub Gooner

Publisher: CreateSpace Independent Publishing Platform (18 May 2016)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1533328161
ISBN-13: 978-1533328168

Donâ€™t be daunted by slow cooking; the time it will take you to prepare your meals will actually be less than cooking with fast methods; in fact, while you are frying a steak, for example, you cannot take your eye off it, as you risk burning it, but when you slow cook your food, all you really need to do is prepare all the ingredients, put them in your slow cooker or crock pot (or even in the oven) and come back to a fully cooked and delicious meal hours later. 

But this is only one of the many advantages of slow cooking; in fact, by slow cooking your meals you will preserve all the nutrients of the ingredients that you cook; your food will be rich in vitamins and proteins, therefore it will be much healthier. 

Slow cooked food is also much tastier, as high temperatures ruin the flavours of food. Moreover, you do not need to add any extra fats to your food, so you will be eating delicious meals that do not make you put on weight. 

And if you thought that by slow cooking your meals your energy bills will go up you are mistaken: most of the heat in frying, for example, is dispersed into the environment while slow cooking makes use of all the heat you use to cook your food. 

In this book, you will find 45 delicious recipes for slow cooking food for all the times of the day and all the seasons, for example, you will find:

* Slow cooking recipes for your breakfast (both savoury and sweet).

* Slow cooking recipes for your lunch (including meat dishes, vegetarian dishes and fish dishes).

* Slow cooking recipes for your dinner.

* Slow cooking recipes for your Sunday roast.

* Slow cooking desserts, including pies, puddings and cakes.

* Easier recipes and top quality gourmet (but still easy) recipes.

* Slow cooking recipes for all tastes and from many countries around the world, for example Japan, Italy, Morocco and Thailand.

So, if you are looking for a great book of slow cooked meals, look no further!
